rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living area with Brutalist design elements incorporating exposed concrete and geometric forms. Large windows on the north facade to maximize natural light and comply with Vastu for auspicious energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A private master bedroom featuring high ceilings and a direct view towards the central courtyard. Designed with accessibility in mind including wider doorways and lowered fixtures.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom designed for wheelchair access with minimal obstructions and ample space. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning towards the east.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Another accessible bedroom designed for family members with sufficient natural light and ventilation. Walls reinforced in a Brutalist style with exposed concrete.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office space that is wheelchair accessible. Designed with soundproofing and ample lighting to promote productivity while keeping privacy intact.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: An open kitchen area integrated into the living space. Features modern Brutalist aesthetics such as concrete countertops and raw finishes. Positioned away from main traffic areas to promote calm.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dining area adjacent to the kitchen for family meals. Emphasizes simplicity and function with direct access to the courtyard for outdoor seating.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: A central open space acting as the heart of the home. Incorporates greenery, seating, and a water feature to enhance Vastu energy flow and provide natural light.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: A two-car garage located on the ground floor. Designed for easy access with wide doors and wheelchair-accessible pathways leading to the living areas.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large entrance that leads directly into the central corridor, ensuring ease of access for all family members including wheelchair users. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning with positive energy flow.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: Secondary entrance intended for deliveries and service access. Designed to minimize interference with the main living areas while maintaining accessibility.
